name: Hotel Opera

reviews.title: Good location, nothing else
reviews.text: The only good thing about this hotel was the location. We travelled with a little child and at check in we were told that they will charge the child breakfast at the same rate as adult, all kids age 2+ pay full price breakfast.

reviews.title: Great position
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights, last day we had to leave at 5 in the morning so none of us had breakfast but we were still charged for it, it was included in the price.

description: Hotel Opera - A charming English inspired hotel. Among the linden trees on a peaceful side street to Kongens Nytorv lies the 3 star Hotel Opera whose neighbors include the Royal Theatre and the vibrant Nyhavn. Hotel Opera is just a 2-minute walk from buses, the metro and all the shopping possibilities on the pedestrian street, Strøget. The hotel's 91 stylish rooms are individually and classically decorated.
